name: A Punk Game
description:
A Punk Game

Prototype Studio Week 12 - A PUNK GAME

Do some punk things to keep your punk value, don't let your mother know! You can call the first floor by the phone on the second floor to stop your mom, or vice versa. You can also open the tap and your mom will close it.

What about the punk things? You can change your clothes and haircut, play drums and guitar, or play punk music on TV.

How to play

  • Move - Click
  • Interact - Click the Button
  • Restart - R
